content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers:
This structure consists of 9 building blocks arranged in 4 layers:
- Layer 1 (Bottom): 3 blue cube blocks forming a U-shape
- Layer 2: 1 yellow horizontal rectangular block serving as a platform
- Layer 3: 3 blocks - 1 blue rectangular block, 1 red cube, and 1 green horizontal block
- Layer 4 (Top): 2 orange triangular pieces forming a roof

## Spatial Relationships:
- The base consists of 3 blue cubes arranged with 2 in front and 1 in back
- The yellow platform sits on top of these blue blocks
- On the platform sits a house-like structure with a blue vertical rectangular block on the left and a red cube on the right
- A green horizontal block sits on top of both the blue and red blocks
- The roof consists of 2 orange triangular pieces forming a peaked roof

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are needed:
- 3× Block #1 (Blue cube) - for the base/stilts
- 1× Block #10 (Yellow horizontal rectangular block) - for the platform
- 1× Block #6 (Blue vertical rectangular block) - for left side of house
- 1× Block #3 (Red cube) - for right side of house
- 1× Block #7 (Green horizontal rectangular block) - for middle band of house
- 1× Block #14 (Orange triangular piece) - for left side of roof
- 1× Block #15 (Orange triangular piece) - for right side of roof

# Assembly Order
```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 1
    Step3: Move block with index 1
    Step4: Move block with index 10
    Step5: Move block with index 6
    Step6: Move block with index 3
    Step7: Move block with index 7
    Step8: Move block with index 14
    Step9: Move block with index 15
}
```
